::Prowl::

Prowl chuckles as Iron Raptor falls back after trying to stand up, 
reaching out a hand to help her up. He nods as she asks him her 
question, blushing just a bit.

"It was the least I could do for you, love," he says, leaning down to 
kiss her but then stopping as he hears her throught, the reason 
drifting into his mind.

Dinobot, and Prowl's jealousy, that's what went wrong. Prowl was 
ashamed of thinking like he did, but it was too late now. He sighs, 
looking at Iron Raptor, knowing that she could hear his thoughts.

"I guess you know now, though," he says, wondering how she'd react.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked back down at her hands for a moment, 
everything still 
> seeming so new, then looking down at her body.
> White hair did cover most of it, only seeing blue gaps and her legs.
> Otherwise...she was naked....
> She sighed, thinking openly, how could she ever go back to base 
like this?
> But then, a little tired of sitting, Iron Raptor slowly got to her 
> feet...only to end up on her rear again.
> She sighed.*
> 
> " I'm not use to these legs."
> 
> * But then Iron Raptor looked up at Prowl, still seeing him as new 
and 
> fairly different.*
> 
> " Thoughts...telepathy?"
> 
> * She moved a strand of hair out of her way, thinking about just 
what Prowl 
> had just said.
> Feel his thoughts, like he could feel hers.*
> 
> " I've seen...your thoughts. The Matrix...and the deal you made."
> 
> * But then her features turned softer, remembering just why Prowl 
had made 
> that head after the merge had gone back.*
> 
> " You did that for me?"
> 
> * But also, something poped up in her mind, a thought which was 
loud and 
> clear. What was it that had triggered the detination, to make the 
merge go 
> wrong?*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
